attributes.action: Call on Nicola Sturgeon to encourage Scottish Parliament to block Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
EU Results from Scotland:
62%: Remain
38%: Leave
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon, First Minister of Scotland, has said she would back the blocking of Brexit by calling on the Scottish Parliament to veto the decision. This comes after the united response from Scotland to Remain in the EU after the Referendum on 23rd June.
